name: NPC Simulator
description:
Become the npc who gives missons instead of who takes misson. Add fearless adventurers to your team and send them to mssons. 

Gameplay

______________

When opened you will see a blank screen, don't think it's broken just wait a bit and orders will start to come. Green orders are for people who wants to join your team, orange ones are for missons.

Don't forget this is just a beta and we'll continue to update it.
